sections.heading: funds; apportionment; county treasurer; no compensation allowed
sections.text: County treasurers shall not charge for receiving and disbursing the school apportionment.SourceLaws 1881, c. 78, subdivision XI, § 8, p. 370;R.S.1913, § 6935;C.S.1922, § 6518;C.S.1929, § 79-2007;R.S.1943, § 79-2007;Laws 1949, c. 256, §

79-1040.School funds; apportionment; county treasurer; no compensation allowed.

County treasurers shall not charge for receiving and disbursing the school apportionment.

SourceLaws 1881, c. 78, subdivision XI, § 8, p. 370;R.S.1913, § 6935;C.S.1922, § 6518;C.S.1929, § 79-2007;R.S.1943, § 79-2007;Laws 1949, c. 256, § 382, p. 820;Laws 1990, LB 1090, § 26;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-1307;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 686.
